eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Bronx; Kings; New York; Queens; Richmond, NY; at 11:29 PM ON DEC 9, 2025 Effective until 01:29 AM DEC 10, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. In the event of an actual emergency, this system would bring you important information. This is only a test.
